name: Hillside Horticultural Therapy Program
address: Atlanta, GA (Specific address not provided in search results)
category: Asian-owned Therapeutic gardening programs in Georgia
description: This program works with children and adolescents (ages 11-17) who struggle with mental health challenges. Activities include planting gardens, making compost, raising butterflies, and feeding birds to benefit students' physical, emotional, intellectual, and social development

name: Trellis Horticultural Therapy Alliance
address: Decatur, GA (Specific address not provided in search results)
category: Asian-owned Therapeutic gardening programs in Georgia
